attributes.action: Ban the use of social media by government officials and political parties.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.facebook.com/DavidCameronOfficial

Read any thread of comments. It will be full of misinformation and arguments about issues at home or abroad. Social media is assessible all over the world. The overall view of our nation is being displayed for all to see. This could be used to inspire hatred on both sides and could be used elsewhere to preach terror.

In conclusion, the use of social media by political parties and gov may end up a threat to our national security.
attributes.background:
The use of social media by government officials and the political parties in the UK is sending the wrong message.
It's inspiring people to publish their opinions to others and in some cases, inspires racial hatred and results in verbal abuse to vulnerable people in society.
